name: Planet Defender (itch) (SominStudios)
description:
A simple game where you have to build towers around a planet to protect it from asteroids.

How To Play :

You can se your current balance on the left and to buy a tower, simply drag it from the square to the planet, find an empty spot, and release it! If you want to cancel the building of a new tower simply hover it over the trash can!

To start a wave simply press the button att the top!

To demolish towers, drag to trashcan to the tower you want to destroy and release over it!

Music : Joshua Mclean - Contemplative Breaks
